item.title: How to deploy theme LoveIt in GitHub Pages
item.author: Juan Gabriel Machuca
item.description: My blog uses hugo with the LoveIt theme that I use to publish this post and all deployed on GitHub Pages. So, in this post we are going to talk about how we can do that. 1 Requeriments: First of all, we need a couple of things before we start, here is my list. You have to install hugo ðŸ‘‰ Installation Read documentation of the amazing LoveIt theme LoveIt Read notes GitHubPages 2 Setup First of all we need to setup project in local, this firsts step you can see also in basic configuration # Create hugo site hugo new site demo_hugo # Move to directory cd demo_hugo git init # add theme LoveIt git submodule add https://github.
